content:
Get in Touch

Have questions or comments? Have an idea for a feature? Submit a pull request!

Ways to Connect

Email

The best way to reach me is via email:

tristan@fddl.dev

GitHub

Find me on GitHub for code-related questions and contributions:

github.com/aviatorcards

Social Media

  • Twitter: @aviatorcards

  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/tristan-6a160b3a2 Note: LinkedIn is a cesspool.

  • Bluesky: @fddl.dev

Found a Bug?

Neat! I like bugs!

github.com/aviatorcards/fddl/issues

Want to Contribute?

Neat! I like bugs!

Thanks for your interest in fddl!

# Get in Touch

Have questions or comments? Have an idea for a feature? Submit a pull request!

## Ways to Connect

### Email

The best way to reach me is via email:

**tristan@fddl.dev**

### GitHub

Find me on GitHub for code-related questions and contributions:

**github.com/aviatorcards**

### Social Media

- **Twitter**: @aviatorcards
- **LinkedIn**: linkedin.com/in/tristan-6a160b3a2 **Note:** LinkedIn is a cesspool.
- **Bluesky**: @fddl.dev

## Found a Bug?

Neat! I like bugs!

**github.com/aviatorcards/fddl/issues**

## Want to Contribute?

Neat! I like bugs!

---

Thanks for your interest in fddl!
